ComicInfo.Summary:
The last issue of Mercury Heat is here and it promises to go out with a nuclear blast sized bang! Luiza is ready to dole out some catastrophic payback to the miscreants that turned a station full of innocents into a charnel house. Now with the true nature of the "Crossed" discovered and scum-bags behind it in her sights, can this one woman wrecking machine manage to save the day without costing everyone at the station their lives? It's a no holds barred race to the finish with a Nuclose-enhanced cop unleashing the hounds of war!
Available with Regular, Wraparound, Art Nouveau, and Excessive Force by series artist Nahuel Lopez.
